name: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure
storyline: Help Emma—the young artist from the 21st century—settle her troubles with Greek gods, prepare Hercules to the contest and save Megara!
summary: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure is a casual puzzle, adventure game in which the young girl Emma finds herself in ancient Greece. Follow Emma as she helps Hercules on all of his adventures!
